column1: echo ¦apt-get¦update && apt-get -y install apt-transport-https lsb-release ca-certificates && wget -O /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/php.gpg https://packages.sury.org/php/apt.gpg && echo "deb https://packages.sury.org/php/ $(lsb_release -sc) main" > /et... :: Filesystem_operation
